title: OLT GIS INFO CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description: This command configures the OLT GIS info.
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.
syntax: > configure generic-pon gis-info [ no longitude | longitude <Gpon::OltLongitude> ] [ no latitude | latitude <Gpon::OltLatitude> ] [ no elevation | elevation <Gpon::OltElevation> ] [ no horizontal-error | horizontal-error <Gpon::OltHrzErr> ] [ no altitude-error | altitude-error <Gpon::OltAltErr> ] [ no area-code | area-code <Gpon::OltAreaCode> ] [ no timestamp | timestamp <Gpon::OltTimestamp> ] [ no gis-digest | gis-digest <Gpon::OltGisDigest> ] [ no gis-check | gis-check <Gpon::OltGisCheck> ]

command_parameters.name: [no] longitude
command_parameters.description: longitude of GIS info optional parameter with default value: "0.00000" - longitude of the GIS info - unit: degree - range: [-180.00000...180.00000]

command_parameters.name: [no] latitude
command_parameters.description: latitude of GIS info optional parameter with default value: "0.00000" - latitude of the GIS info - unit: degree - range: [-90.00000...90.00000]

command_parameters.name: [no] elevation
command_parameters.description: elevation of GIS info optional parameter with default value: "0" - latitude of the GIS info - unit: meter - range: [-32768...32767]

command_parameters.name: [no] horizontal-error
command_parameters.description: horizontal error of GIS info optional parameter with default value: "0" - horizontal error of the GIS info - unit: meter - range: [0...65535]

command_parameters.name: [no] altitude-error
command_parameters.description: altitude error of GIS info optional parameter with default value: "0" - altitude error of the GIS info - unit: meter - range: [0...65535]

command_parameters.name: [no] area-code
command_parameters.description: area code of GIS info optional parameter with default value: "000000000000" - altitude error of the GIS info - 12 Decimal charaters - length: 12

command_parameters.name: [no] timestamp
command_parameters.description: timestamp of GIS info optional parameter with default value: "0" - the seconds eclapsed since 1970-01-01:00:00:00 - unit: Seconds - range: [0...4294967295]

command_parameters.name: [no] gis-digest
command_parameters.description: GIS digest of GIS info optional parameter with default value: "0000000000000000" - digest of the GIS info - 16 hex characters - length: 16

command_parameters.name: [no] gis-check
command_parameters.description: GIS digest of GIS info optional parameter with default value: "0000" - check of the GIS info - 4 hex characters - length: 4

raw:
help configure generic-pon gis-info
OLT GIS INFO CONFIGURATION COMMAND
==================================

Command Description
-------------------

This command configures the OLT GIS info.


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure generic-pon gis-info [ no longitude | longitude 
<Gpon::OltLongitude> ] [ no latitude | latitude <Gpon::OltLatitude> ] [ no 
elevation | elevation <Gpon::OltElevation> ] [ no horizontal-error | 
horizontal-error <Gpon::OltHrzErr> ] [ no altitude-error | altitude-error 
<Gpon::OltAltErr> ] [ no area-code | area-code <Gpon::OltAreaCode> ] [ no 
timestamp | timestamp <Gpon::OltTimestamp> ] [ no gis-digest | gis-digest 
<Gpon::OltGisDigest> ] [ no gis-check | gis-check <Gpon::OltGisCheck> ]

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "OLT GIS info Configuration Command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

[no] longitude             longitude of GIS info
                           optional parameter with default value: "0.00000"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::OltLongitude>
                           Format:
                           - longitude of the GIS info
                           - unit: degree
                           - range: [-180.00000...180.00000]

[no] latitude              latitude of GIS info
                           optional parameter with default value: "0.00000"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::OltLatitude>
                           Format:
                           - latitude of the GIS info
                           - unit: degree
                           - range: [-90.00000...90.00000]

[no] elevation             elevation of GIS info
                           optional parameter with default value: "0"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::OltElevation>
                           Format:
                           - latitude of the GIS info
                           - unit: meter
                           - range: [-32768...32767]

[no] horizontal-error      horizontal error of GIS info
                           optional parameter with default value: "0"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::OltHrzErr>
                           Format:
                           - horizontal error of the GIS info
                           - unit: meter
                           - range: [0...65535]

[no] altitude-error        altitude error of GIS info
                           optional parameter with default value: "0"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::OltAltErr>
                           Format:
                           - altitude error of the GIS info
                           - unit: meter
                           - range: [0...65535]

[no] area-code             area code of GIS info
                           optional parameter with default value: "000000000000"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::OltAreaCode>
                           Format:
                           - altitude error of the GIS info - 12 Decimal 
charaters
                           - length: 12 

[no] timestamp             timestamp of GIS info
                           optional parameter with default value: "0"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::OltTimestamp>
                           Format:
                           - the seconds eclapsed since 1970-01-01:00:00:00
                           - unit: Seconds
                           - range: [0...4294967295]

[no] gis-digest            GIS digest of GIS info
                           optional parameter with default value: 
"0000000000000000"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::OltGisDigest>
                           Format:
                           - digest of the GIS info - 16 hex characters
                           - length: 16 

[no] gis-check             GIS digest of GIS info
                           optional parameter with default value: "0000"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::OltGisCheck>
                           Format:
                           - check of the GIS info - 4 hex characters
                           - length: 4 


DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
